about_the_game:
The Good Ghouls is a campy horror mystery featuring action-packed brawler combat and hilarious narrative elements. Fight a demonic robot apocalypse as your favorite classic monster.






Use horrifying combos to bash some robot skulls. Punch your way through hordes of robots and unlock powerful new combat skills that will reduce your enemies to piles of nuts and bolts. Collect gears in the wake of your robot destruction to purchase items and upgrades for some extra scary fun!






Explore the town of Ghoulcrest, where the environments and characters are powered by the nostalgia of your favorite 80s/90s horror flicks. Should you choose to help some of your monstrous neighbors out, you might be in for additional pickups or loot.






It’s the night of the school dance, but instead of doing the monster mash, you’re stuck in detention scanning books into the digital library. All hell breaks loose when the Necronomicon is scanned into the computer, spawning an army of dangerously demonic robots. It’s up to you to uncover who is responsible for unleashing evil across Ghoulcrest.






  • Campy horror fun
  • A spooky side-scrolling adventure with atmospheric 3D art packed with charm
  • A killer soundtrack by Reversed Flow, inspired by 80's horror classics
  • Complete side quests and purchase power-ups to level up your character
  • The Good Ghouls combines classic beat 'em up and story-driven adventure genres through a quirky and fun story, and in a world crafted with unique art direction to invoke the nostalgia of your favorite horror movies

  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390

short_description: The Good Ghouls is a brawler-meets-adventure game combining beat 'em up gameplay with campy horror fun. Play and upgrade your favorite ghoul, meet quirky characters alongside a killer soundtrack, and fight a demonic robot uprising to take back the town of Ghoulcrest.
